document.full_text: we often think of social media as a powder keg, but in the n.f.l. labor dispute, it may be acting more like a boiling chip.
document.title: in lockout, twitter can be a pulpit or a distraction
lines_and_colors: we often think of social media as a powder keg, but in the n.f.l. labor dispute, it may be acting more like a boiling chip.
